name: Burl Side Table
description: The Burl Side Table showcases a simple cylinder shape and round top crafted from authentic Burl wood. Highly textural, burl wood is the perfect marriage of nature and luxe. Made from deformed growths on trees, this rare wood has been used in luxury interiors for over 100 years. Our design team has taken this timeless material and paired it with a sleek timeless shape to create an understated yet opulent accent table. The side table exudes warmth, the tactile piece is ideal for those looking to incorporate a hint of nature into their design. As this is a natural product each side table will be unique featuring unique knots and markings.
